mapper.select: select event_no, DATE_FORMAT(event_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS event_date, event_name, event_memo, icon_id from calender where user_no = #{user_no}
select event_no, photo_url from invitation where event_no = #{event_id}
select p.product_no, p.title, p.price, p.brand, p.itemimg from funding_product fp join product p ON fp.product_no = p.product_no where fp.event_no = #{event_id}
